about_the_game:
Start Your Cooking Adventure!

Jump start your new career in the Kitchen with the Starter Pack! This has everything you need to get ahead:

150 spoons, so you can upgrade your kitchen equipment right away;

3 +3 Customer boosts, so you can keep the head count rolling in when you need them;

3 Dazzlers to sweeten the customer moods when they go sour;

3 Waiter boosts to help you move the plates out of the kitchen for you automatically;

3 Chef's Helper boosts to cook things even faster;

3 Eco boosts, so you can earn more coins;

3 No-Burn boosts to keep your dishes from overcooking.
detailed_description:
Start Your Cooking Adventure!

Jump start your new career in the Kitchen with the Starter Pack! This has everything you need to get ahead:

150 spoons, so you can upgrade your kitchen equipment right away;

3 +3 Customer boosts, so you can keep the head count rolling in when you need them;

3 Dazzlers to sweeten the customer moods when they go sour;

3 Waiter boosts to help you move the plates out of the kitchen for you automatically;

3 Chef's Helper boosts to cook things even faster;

3 Eco boosts, so you can earn more coins;

3 No-Burn boosts to keep your dishes from overcooking.
name: Cooking Craze - Starter Pack
short_description: Jump start your new career in the Kitchen with the Starter Pack! This has everything you need to get ahead, including 150 spoons and 3 of every booster type!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
